name: R3
description: R3 - The Art of Rocketry was a computer game for the Amiga series of computers in 1995. It was released as a playable demo on the coverdisks of Amiga Power (issue 54) in October 1995 and on Amiga Format (issue 89) in September 1996. The game was an independent release and orderable directly from the author, Bruce Webster and several other agents scattered worldwide.
